_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four floods [sn45.171:1.7]: The floods of desire to be reborn
The purpose of developing the noble eigh: Direct knowledge of the four floods
Complete understanding of the four floods
Giving up of the four floods
